product_name: Blackburn Central 100 Front / 20 Rear Bike Light Set
long_description: Get set for lowlight rides with this front and rear light combination from Blackburn. It includes a 100-lumen front light and a 20-lumen rear light to boost your visibility while biking.
short_description: Get set for lowlight rides with this front and rear light combination from Blackburn. It includes a 100-lumen front light and a 20-lumen rear light to boost your visibility while biking.
